nodes.text: EVS-6962 was an EVS Construction Droid which was active on Coruscant shortly after Rogue Squadron helped bring the planet under New Republic rule. Under Wedge Antilles supervision, EVS-6962 uncovered a secret Imperial Interrogation Center during its routine tear-down assignment. This center was later discovered to have been built by Emperor Palpatine to test prisoners for Force-sensitivity, as it contained several Force detectors which Luke Skywalker used during his search for new Jedi.

If the identification number for EVS-6962 was entered into a touch-tone phone in the Brooklyn area, it would dial the They Might Be Giants Dial-A-Song service, which was a purposeful insert by Dan Wallace into The Essential Guide to Droids.
